result.execSummary:
The defendant Elacsh N Solomon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Elacsh N Solomon is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Elacsh N Solomon was found guilty of Felon Possess Firearm, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Pay the costs, fees, assessments and surcharges (including the DNA surcharge) during the term of extended supervision.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
DOC to collect monetary sums/amounts at the rate of 25% of prison funds.
Consecutive to: consecutive to any other sentence.

superMiscConds.notes:
Follow all rules of extended supervision.
Defendant to provide a biological specimen for DNA analysis (if not already done so).

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Elacsh N Solomon

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Original Transcript (29 pages) commencing 02-04-2016 SENTENCING HEARING  received and filed.
Defendant Elacsh N Solomon in court with attorney Danielle Louise Shelton.  Jennifer Lynn Williams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Sentencing proceeds.  State has complied with victim notification.  Statements by counsel and defendant. 

As to Count 1:
COURT ORDERS defendant to serve a term in the Wisconsin State Prison system - TOTAL LENGTH OF SENTENCE -  24  months, consecutive to any other sentence -  INITIAL TERM OF CONFINEMENT -  12 months  -  EXTENDED SUPERVISION -  12 months

Court finds defendant  IS  eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program  and  IS  eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.

CONDITIONS OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION:
-  Follow all rules of extended supervision
-  No firearms
-  Pay the costs, fees, assessments and surcharges (including the DNA surcharge) during the term of extended supervision.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.

COURT ORDERS:
-  defendant to provide a biological specimen for DNA analysis (if not already done so)
-  DOC to collect monetary sums/amounts at the rate of 25% of prison funds.

Appeal rights given.  Written Explanation of Determinate Sentence received and filed.

Defendant Elacsh N Solomon in court with Attorney Danielle Louise Shelton.  Defendant Elacsh N Solomon in custody.  Daniel j Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

As to Count 1:
Defendant waives constitutional rights, enters a plea of  GUILTY  and is examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum  received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the Complaint as a factual basis for judgment.  Court finds defendant guilty as charged in the Information/Complaint and orders a judgment of conviction be entered.

As to Count 2:
Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court orders Count  2  DISMISSED.

Parties are prepared to proceed to sentencing.
Clerk:  jms

Court ordered defendant to be produced for the next court date if still in custody.

  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 4, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Danielle Louise Shelton in court, defendant Elacsh N Solomon not in court, in custody.  Daniel j Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel requests adjournment of today's scheduled plea and sentencing.
She is now counsel of record and has not yet met with defendant.
Case adjourned for plea and sentencing in Branch 28.
Clerk:  jms
Plea/Sentencing Hearing on Wednesday, February 3, 2016 at 1:30 PM in BR 28, CH Rm 629 of the Circuit Court of Milwaukee County.

Attorney Valeria Lenise Taylor in court, defendant Elacsh N Solomon not in court, in custody.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference conducted.  Parties engaged in settlement negotiations.  Defense requests date for possible resolution of this matter.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 3, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Valeria Lenise Taylor in court, defendant Elacsh N Solomon not in court, in custody.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Parties request another status conference.  Status conference scheduled for December 1, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Valeria Lenise Taylor in court, defendant Elacsh N Solomon not in court, in custody.   Due to time constraints, and no appearance by the State, matter adjourned for status.  Status conference scheduled for November 19, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Effective October 31, 2015, per Chief Judge directive 15-19, this case is assigned to the Honorable William Brash, Br 21.

Attorney Valeria Lenise Taylor in court, defendant Elacsh N Solomon not in court, in custody.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Matter is scheduled for plea and sentencing. Defense counsel is not able to proceed today. Additionally, Court is currently in trial and unable to conduct hearing.  Defense counsel advised that effective October 31, 2015, per Chief Judge directive 15-19, this case is assigned to the Honorable William Brash, Br 21.  Status conference scheduled for November 18, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/Sentencing Hearing on Tuesday, October 27, 2015 at 1:30 PM in BR 35, CH Rm 629 of the Circuit Court of Milwaukee County.

Attorney Valeria Lenise Taylor in court (by phone), defendant Elacsh N Solomon not in court, in custody.  Denis John Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is in custody in Kettle Moraine Correctional Institution. Matter is scheduled for plea hearing today, counsel was recently appointed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 27, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Alexis B Stewart in court, defendant Elacsh N Solomon not in court, in custody.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 7.   All parties notified as of August 03, 2015 this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35, in room 629 of the courthouse.  Plea hearing scheduled for 09-14-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Alexis B Stewart in court, defendant Elacsh N Solomon not in court, in custody.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 7.  Plea hearing scheduled for 07-06-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Elacsh N Solomon in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Defendant Elacsh N Solomon in custody.  Ron Dague for Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Thomas McAdams, Branch 07.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 07.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Terese Dick on behalf of attorney Alexis B Stewart in court, defendant Elacsh N Solomon not in court, in custody. Ronald Dague on behalf of Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
Case set for preliminary hearing. Defense counsel request adjournment, as attorney of record is unavailable for today's proceeding. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for Preliminary Hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms. Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Elacsh N Solomon in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Defendant Elacsh N Solomon in custody.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge McAdams, Branch 7.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings. Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to count 2. DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
